content: क्षिप्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [क्षिप्-रक्] (<ab>compar.</ab> क्षेपीयस्; <ab>superl.</ab> क्षेपिष्ठ) {@--1@} Elastic (as a bow). {@--2@} Quick, speedy. --प्रं {@--1@} A measure of time = (1/15) of a Muhūrta. {@--2@} The part of the hand between the thumb and the forefinger. --प्रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Quickly, speedily, immediately; विनाशं व्रजति क्षिप्रमामपात्रमिवांभसि <ls>Ms. 3. 179</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 3. 6</ls>; <ls>Bk. 2. 44.</ls>
